thread.section_title: SkyLux Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SkyLux Travel | www.skyluxtravel.com
thread.title: Ms. Suzanne Rayson
thread.title_full: SkyLux Travel reviewed by Ms. Suzanne Rayson

author: Ms. Suzanne Rayson
title: Ms. Suzanne Rayson
text: This was our second experience with SKYLUX. Great to be able to speak to the same consultant who remembered our needs and provided reliable service. Communication using email and voice were clear and any concerns on our end were quickly addressed. Our flights were arranged within hours and our tickets are now confirmed and paid for. We will certainly be using SKYLUX again!
